member.name: T:MaxMind.Db.InvalidDatabaseException
member.summary: Thrown when the MaxMind database file is incorrectly formatted

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A message that describes the error.

member.name: M:MaxMind.Db.InvalidDatabaseException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception. If the parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.
